name: Button Smasher (rymlks, wandream)
description:
Some days you just can't get rid of a bomb. Button Smasher is a game about a wizard carrying a magic bomb that will explode at any moment. Using your magic, you can prevent the bomb from exploding as long as you have mana, but you don't have much mana! The only way to get more mana is by breaking the power crystals in your pocket, but this comes at a cost. Each crystal controls one of your character's actions, and when the crystal breaks, you lose control over that action. Each crystal does something different when it breaks, and you have to figure out what actions you can afford to lose to get to the finish line on time!

A game by Schala and Rick.
